item.title: Setting up OpenJ9 on the Server
item.description:
This document will guide you setup OpenJ9 VM on the “CompL Server”. Do let us know if you face any issues while setting up the server. If you have already setup your working directory make sure you have selected yes for docker in docker.

(4) Do you want to use docker inside docker [y/n]? y

See more details here: Link

This list the steps for setting up openj9 with jdk8, just few changes required for setting it up for jdk 21:
